description.en: Mooyoung, a snobbish dreamer who wants to fight! But what are your wishes? 'Be a partner!'

title.en: Una kunoichi que te hace querer arrepentirte de haberla ayudado

altTitles.ja: 助けてもらったことを後悔したくなるメ〇ガキくノ一ちゃん

title.en: Gomennasai Ojou-sama, Ore wa Maid ga Sukinan desu

altTitles.ja: ごめんなさいお嬢様、俺はメイドが好きなんです

description.en: Love Triangle Romcom about a rich girl in love with her servant but the servant is in love with the maid!
description.ja:
苦学生のユウトは、たまたま見つけた高額時給のアルバイト求人に応募し、お金持ちのお屋敷で使用人として働くことになった。真面目に仕事をこなしていたそんなある日、勤め先であるお屋敷のアリサお嬢様から愛の告白を受けてしまう! しかし、ユウトはお嬢様に仕えるメイドのサクヤに恋をしていて…!?
お嬢様×メイド×使用人のピラミッドでトライアングルなラブコメディー!

(from: https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1570)

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

title.en: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness

altTitles.ja: アカギ－闇に降り立った天才
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才

description.en: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

altTitles.ja: 黒ギャルさんが来る！

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?

altTitles.en: Mone-san's Overly Serious Way of Dating

altTitles.ja: モネさんのマジメすぎるつき合い方

altTitles.zh: 萌音同学太过认真的交往方式

altTitles.ko: 모네 양의 완전 진지한 사귀는 법

description.en: An alluring and popular honor student who goes by the name of Mone. Steadfast and diligent, she only has one foreseeable flaw; her philosophy on love is utterly trash! But both her mind and her heart might be swayed sooner than she thinks in this school love manga.

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

altTitles.ja: 風夏

description.en: Yuu Haruna just moved into town and is addicted to twitter. When he goes out to buy dinner he bumps into a mysterious girl, Fuuka Akitsuki, who breaks his phone thinking he was trying to take a picture of her panties. How will his new life change now?
description.pt-br: O protagonista Yuu Haruna se muda para uma cidade e conhece uma garota estranha chamada Fuuka (cujo nome tem caracteres kanji para "vento" e "verão"). Esta menina, que é como um vento de verão possui um poder misterioso para atrair as pessoas.

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

description.en:
Lu Renjia, an intern teacher, joins Onion Academy.

On the day of her employment, her childhood friend and elder brother, Wu Qi, suddenly goes missing.

While searching for Wu Qi, she gradually discovers another soul residing in her body...

Who are they? And who am I? As she unravels the mystery of herself, she is fortunate to have companions from the academy fighting alongside her, confronting conspiracies, and revealing cruel hidden truths.

altTitles.de: Die Tagebücher der Apothekerin - Geheimnisse am Kaiserhof

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.  


---

description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

title.en: Akuma wa Rozario ni Kiss o suru

altTitles.ja: 悪魔はロザリオにキスをする

altTitles.vi: Lên Chuỗi Tràng Hạt, Ác Ma đặt Nụ Hôn

description.en:
Since his childhood, Yoshihiro Yoshinaga has faced countless challenges, distancing himself from the company of others and the possibility of forging friendships due to a persistent problem: being harassed by spirits from an early age.

This constant spectral presence has cast shadows over his life, weaving a web of misfortunes. However, the course of his life takes a drastic turn when a giant demon unexpectedly emerges intent on taking his life. In the midst of this crisis, a chance encounter with Alicia Baal, a beautiful nun residing within a church, becomes the catalyst for a radical transformation to his destiny.
description.ja: 幸彦は幽霊が見えたが、その実態は悪魔だった。ある日、本物の悪魔に遭遇。逃げた先の教会でシスター・アリシアと出会い、悪魔退治の契約を交わす。しかし彼女の正体は、魔王になることを企む「悪魔」だった――！

title.en: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~ Akuma no Niidzuma ~

altTitles.ja: 願いを叶えてもらおうと悪魔を召喚したけど、可愛かったので結婚しました　～悪魔の新妻～
悪魔の新妻

altTitles.ja-ro: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~ Akuma no Niidzuma ~
Negai o Kanaete Moraou to Akuma o Shoukan Shita Kedo, Kawaikatta node Kekkon Shimashita - Akuma no Niidzuma
Negai o Kanaete Moraou to Akuma o Shōkan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~ Akuma no Nīdzuma ~
Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shita Kedo, Kawaikatta node Kekkon Shimashita - Akuma no Niizuma

altTitles.ja: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shita Kedo, Kawaikatta node Kekkon Shimashita - Akuma no Niidzuma

altTitles.en: I Summoned the Devil to Grant Me a Wish, but I Married Her Instead Since She Was Adorable ~My New Devil Wife~

altTitles.es-la: Mi nueva esposa es el diablo
Conjuré al diablo para que me cumpliera un deseo, pero me casé con ella porque ella era adorable ~Mi nueva esposa diabólica~
Invoqué al diablo para hacer realidad mi deseo, pero era muy hermosa, así que me casé con ella ~ Mi nueva esposa es el diablo ~

altTitles.vi: Tôi triệu hồi ác quỷ để thực hiện điều ước, nhưng tôi lại muốn cưới cô ấy vì cổ quá xinh đẹp ~ Cô vợ ác quỷ~

altTitles.ru: Я вызвал демонессу, чтобы она исполнила мое желание, но вместо этого женился на ней, потому что она слишком очаровательна~ Моя новая жена Демонесса~

description.en: Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish. He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind, to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand and they go on to future adventures together.
description.es-la: Un aventurero joven y huérfano trata de conjurar al diablo para obtener ayuda con su disciplina, pues sus habilidades son pocas. El diablo viene en forma de una bella que le ofrece un deseo. Tal fue su enamoramiento con su apariencia que le pide la primera cosa que le vino a la mente, que sea su esposa. Sonrojada, ella acepta su pedido sorpresivo y se dedican a aventurar juntos.
description.pt-br: Theo Aspel, que pertence a guilda de mercenarios, estava entrando e saindo de várias equipes repetidamente por ser muito fraco. Um dia desejando se tornar mais forte ele consegue invocar o diabo que concede qualquer desejo. No momento em que se deparou com o diabo a vontade de "ficar forte" desapareceu e ao ser questionado pelo Diabo sobre seu desejo, Theo responde "Por favor se case comigo!" Conheça a história de um menino herbívoro e da garota diabo carnívora que se tornam um casal e vivem felizes enquanto fazem bagunça por onde passa.

description.en:
Our protagonist, who has cleared the extremely difficult "Vanta Black Ring" a thousand times, awoke in the body of "Ordinary Villager A (Hans)" in the tutorial area. 

Monsters were attacking the village! In the midst of life and death, he couldn't help but think of the hero named Cadis and how he'd show up and defeat the monsters — until that very hero died with a single attack. Just when he thought everything was over, he absorbed the hero's abilities!

What happened to the protagonist who wanted to survive comfortably beside the hero, exactly?

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
Ikedo Sadaharu, a transfer student at Shiratake High School, quickly earns the nickname "Gorilla-Man" due to his intimidating appearance. Despite his fearsome looks, Ikedo's true nature is misunderstood by his peers. The story humorously explores his attempts to fit into his new school, deal with bullies, and inadvertently gain respect, blending comedy with school life drama.

Won the 14th Kodansha Manga Award for general manga in 1990 (tied with Chinmoku no Kantai).

A book that allows him to return and re-do his high school life in his dreams. Follow Chono and the girls of his dreams as they reshape their wasted youths!
description.fr: Même à l'université, Chono est coincé dans les regrets de ses années de lycée. Ses journées ennuyeuses s'arrêtent brusquement lorsqu'il tombe sur un livre mystérieux... Un livre qui lui permet de revenir et de refaire sa vie de lycéen dans ses rêves. Suivez Chono et les filles de ses rêves alors qu'ils remodèlent leur jeunesse gâchée !
description.ja: やり残したことだらけの高校生活を送ったぼっち大学生の蝶野ツトム。空虚な日々を過ごす中で、偶然手にした不思議な本…。それはなんと、夢の中で超リアルな高校時代に戻れるものだった!!　関わることのなかった少女たちとの学園生活が始まる――。青春やり直し“夢”ラブコメ開幕!!
description.es-la: Chouno es un estudiante universitario que pasó sus años de preparatoria sin hacer nada y ahora está lleno de remordimientos. Mientras pasa sus días sin hacer nada especial, se topa con un libro misterioso. Es un libro que le permite revivir vida de instituto en sus sueños... ¡Comienza el sueño de Chouno de recuperar su juventud! Una comedia romántica tipo remake.
description.pt-br: Mesmo na universidade, Chono está preso aos arrependimentos do passado de seus anos de colegial. Seus dias monótonos terminam abruptamente quando ele se depara com um livro misterioso…. Um livro que lhe permite voltar e refazer sua vida de colegial em seus sonhos. Siga Chono e as meninas de seus sonhos enquanto reformulam seus jovens desperdiçados!

description.en: This is the story of two of the greatest military commanders in history: the Roman Publius Cornelius Scipio and the Carthaginian Hannibal. The story follows the two of them from their early life on. Hannibal is initially shown as a strangely silent infant, who seemed like the gods forgot to put a soul in his little body. However, he soon begins to speak in a way that shows his remarkable abilities. Hannibal and Scipio are driven enemies, and their struggle shaped an era.

description.en: Nagisa may look like a delinquent, but he's just a typical teen trying to figure out what to do with his life. Nagisa's best friend, Issa, already knows what his own passion is: fish! Issa often skips school to work at the Nagahama fish market, and the two boys hang out near the ocean almost every day. When Nagisa suspects that Issa has a girlfriend, it turns his world upside down. Is he in love with his best friend? Could his best friend possibly like him back?

Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Mangyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. description.en:
Komura is a middle school boy who is head-over-heels in love with his next-seat neighbor Mie, a girl with terrible eyesight who just can't get used to carrying her glasses, often leaving them at home, or accidentally breaking them. He opts to help her as much as he possibly can, and through those efforts, she begins getting acquainted with his kindness. Will she reciprocate?

---
A delightfully charming romantic comedy about a boy who only has eyes for the girl who always forgets her glasses!

With the new school year comes a new homeroom, new classmates, and a new desk for the timid Komura. But any trepidation he might've felt quickly dissipates when he catches sight of Mie, his new seat neighbor.

Apt to quietly blurt out the most random things, the quirky Mie wears thick glasses that accentuate her lovely eyes, making Komura’s heart skip a beat!

Unfortunately, Mie is pathologically forgetful and can never seem to remember to bring her glasses to class. It's not all bad, though! Her resulting squinty, mean-girl face sends Komura’s heart into overdrive too!

While Komura is keen to help out and share his textbooks with Mie, will his heart give out from the almost daily strain of being up close and personal with his crush?!
description.fr:
Entre eux deux, c’est l’amour flou !

Mie, la voisine de classe de Komura, a oublié ses lunettes. Encore. Déjà troublé rien qu’en la voyant le jeune homme fait de son mieux pour aider sa camarade tête en l’air.Mais, dans un effort désespéré d’y voir plus clair, Mie se retrouve très près de lui… beaucoup trop près ! Komura ne sait plus comment réagir à cette soudaine proximité. Au propre comme au figuré, c’est l’occasion pour lui de se rapprocher !
description.ja:
隣の席の女の子がめがねを忘れた。
フォローしてあげたい小村くんだけど、見ようと一生懸命な彼女の距離が近すぎて ── 。
Twitterで話題沸騰 のゼロ距離ラブコメ♪
description.ru:
Комуре очень нравится его одноклассница Мия-сан, он просто без ума от нее и считает миленькой, несмотря на то, что Мия-сан очень близорука и носит толстенные очки. Но когда она однажды забывает их дома, и становится все ближе к Комуре в буквальном смысле, Комура познает всю силу своей любви к ней.

description.uk: Комура Каеде вчиться в середній школі і з головою закоханий в свою однокласницю, Мію Аі, яка сидить поруч з ним. В дівчинки дуже поганий зір і без окулярів вона нормально не бачить, але часто забуває чи ламає їх. Комура хоче їй допомогти скільки може і так Мія дізнається про його доброту. Чи віддячить вона?
description.es-la: Una historia simple pero agradable... Los días normales de Komura-kun, quien ayuda a su compañera Mie-san, la cual tiene que usar lentes y siempre termina olvidándolos o hay algún suceso que evita su visibilidad... Estos sucesos los llevarán a entablar una amistad y también podría llegar a ser... ¿Amor?
description.pt-br: Komura é um garoto do fundamental que está perdidamente apaixonado por sua vizinha de cadeira Mie, uma garota com uma visão terrível que simplesmente não consegue se acostumar a carregar seus óculos, muitas vezes deixando eles em casa ou quebrando acidentalmente. Ele opta por ajudá-la tanto quanto possível e, por meio desses esforços, ela começa a se familiarizar com sua bondade.

description.en:
“Onii-san, congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”

“M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”

My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances, I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore, my partner is a plain girl, Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school, I went through a bad experience. Ever since then, I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought, but…

“…Well then, who’s your favorite heroine right now?”

Turns out, she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.

“Err, since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”

And, the moment I let my guard down, she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…

“Just between you and me, I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”

It’s a secret from everyone else, but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But, Yuuka’s true self, which she only shows when she’s alone with me, is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka, starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!
description.ja: 親の都合で結婚させられることになった高校生の俺。お相手は――なんとアイドルゲームの声優だった!!まさかの“中の人”との同棲生活がスタート!　2人だけの新生活は、甘くて可愛いしかない!?
description.pt-br:
“Nii-san, parabéns pelo seu casamento. Esta pessoa é sua noiva. ”
"M-meu nome é Watanae Yuuka... estou na mesma classe que você ..."

Meu nome é Sakata Yuuichi. Estou no segundo ano do ensino médio.
Devido às circunstâncias dos meus pais, de repente vou me casar ..?
Além disso, minha parceira é uma garota comum, Watanae-san.
Durante meu terceiro ano do ensino médio, passei por uma experiência ruim. Desde então, só me interessei por heroínas 2D. Não há absolutamente nenhuma maneira de eu me interessar por uma garota 3D.
Foi o que pensei, mas ...

“...Bem, então quem é a sua heroína favorita agora?”

Acontece que ela era na verdade uma otaku que fala bastante quando você fica intimo dela.
Ela sempre se envolveria com prazer em nossas conversas. Ela me mostrou coisas que eu nunca esperaria de uma garota da minha classe.

"Eh, já que vamos morar juntos... Tudo bem se eu te chamar de Yuu-kun?"

E, no momento em que baixei a guarda, ela imediatamente tentaria encurtar a distância entre nós.
O que mais…

“Só entre você e eu, na verdade sou a dubladora de Izumi Yuuna de『Alice Stage』. Obrigado por sempre me apoiar! ”

É um segredo para todos os outros, mas acontece que ela é na verdade a dubladora da minha heroína favorita?!
Estou interessado apenas em heroínas 2D!
Mas, o verdadeiro eu de Yuuka, que ela só mostra quando está sozinha comigo, não é nada além de fofa! 
Esta é a minha história com Yuuka, começando como noivos. Um romcom comovente e caótico!

Aquellos que se excitan deben liberar su tensión utilizando al sexo opuesto, lo que pone a Yamato en una gran crisis mientras intenta evitar un escándalo como idol. ¿Será capaz de superar esta terrible situación?

description.es-la: Un grupo de amigos de la infancia se separa a causa de la muerte de una amiga del grupo, Menma. Ahora Jintan, un integrante del grupo, puede ver el espiritu de Menma que quiere cumplir un deseo, pero para eso, Jintan deberá reunir a sus antiguos amigos de la infancia, el problema es que ellos han cambiado mucho. Jintan tiene que ayudar a Menma a cumplir su deseo y así poder ir al "cielo".
description.pt-br: Um grupo de seis amigos de infância se separam após um deles, Honma "Menma" Meiko, morrer em um acidente. Dez anos seguintes desta tragédia, o líder do grupo, Yadomi Jinta, isola-se da sociedade e vive recluso. Em um dia de verão, porém, Menma aparece para Jinta, com uma aparência mais velha, pedindo-lhe ajuda para realizar seu desejo. Ela acredita que precisa realizá-lo para cumprir seu destino. Só que Menma não lembra qual era seu desejo, fazendo com que Jinta reúna seus amigos de infância outra vez, pois acredita que eles sejam a chave para resolver esse problema. No entanto, os sentimentos escondidos, os conflitos internos e a persistência dos sentimentos de tristeza pelos pais de Menma, resultam em complicações para o grupo, enquanto eles lutam não só para ajudarem Menma, mas a si mesmos.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス
Megami no Kafeterasu

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

title.en: Tensei Shite High Elf ni Narimashitaga, Slow Life wa 120-nen de Akimashita

altTitles.ja: 転生してハイエルフになりましたが、スローライフは１２０年で飽きました　-Highelf with a long life-

altTitles.en: I Was Reborn and Became a High Elf, but I Got Tired of My Slow Life after 120 Years
Growing Tired of the Lazy High Elf Life After 120 Years
High Elf with a Long Life
Enough with This Slow Life! I Was Reincarnated as a High Elf and Now I’m Bored

description.en:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Acer’s had enough of it! That’s right. Acer isn’t quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world...meaning he’s got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He’s also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Acer leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that’s more his pace. See what excitement awaits in the outside world full of humans, dwarves, and even other elves!

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

altTitles.ja: ショタおに

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain. But underneath the perfect façade, he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost, Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.

But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.
description.fr:
Le mystérieux insecticide "Jungle Juice" a fait de lui un humain insecte.  
Jang Su-chan, un étudiant qui cachait ses dents, a un jour ressemblé à cela.  
Vous serez vu par tout le monde, et vous serez dans le monde des insectes.  
Vous vous battrez contre la logique du faible…  
  
Action/ Fantaisie de divers pouvoirs d'insectes  
Le nouveau héros de Super String Universe fait son apparition !
description.pt-br: Jang Suchan é um aluno universitário no topo de sua cadeia social. Mas, debaixo da faixada perfeita, ele esconde um par de asas de inseto que cresceram de repente após usar um inseticida misterioso chamado “Jungle Juice”. A vida de Suchan desmorona quando ele exibe suas asas ao mundo afim salvar a vida de outra pessoa. Quando toda a esperança parece perdida, Suchan se depara com um mundo escondido de insetos humanos onde todos são aceitos por quem são. Mas a lei da selva governa essa sociedade secreta e todos devem lutar para sobreviverem.

title.en: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ剣士、追放されたので魔術師に転向する ～剣士のときはゴミスキルだった『絶対記憶』は魔術師にとっては神スキルでした～

altTitles.en: The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!

description.en: In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is ‘Absolute Memory’. A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!

Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

description.en: During the reign of Philip IV of France, Acre is in the midst of a war between the invading Mamluks and the Knights Templar trying to protect the Holy Land. On the day when Lea's family decided to leave by boat to escape the threat of war, Lea is forced to go into the middle of the war to return the sword entrusted to her by the leader of the Knights Templar. However, when she arrives trembling with the sword firmly strapped to her back, she witnesses the leader's death, and in a moment of danger, she meets Balta, the beautiful knight she had dreamed of since childhood. But this was not the time for her to indulge in such sentiments. The sword had lost its owner, and the atmosphere in the Knights Templar is somewhat strange. “It’s dangerous to go alone, I will take you there.” --Written by the same author as The Golden Forest--

altTitles.en: If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love
Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This

description.en:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: スパイダーマン：オクトパスガール

description.en: Doctor Octopus falls into a coma; when he awakens, he finds himself inhabiting the body of Japanese middle schooler Otoha Okutamiya.
description.pt-br: Doutor Ictopus entrou em coma. Quando ele acorda, ele se encontra vivendo no corpo de uma japonesa do Fundamental, Otoha Okutamiya.

When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

altTitles.zh-hk: 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙

altTitles.zh: 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

description.en: In a world slowly getting corrupted by the growth of magic users, a young man strives to triumph over it becoming the best hero he can be in this ENTIRELY, most DEFINITELY, absolutely SERIOUS manga.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
